data.title: Chat2DB - AI Text2SQL Tool for Easy Database Management
data.description: Chat2DB is an AI-powered SQL client that transforms natural language into SQL queries. Supports MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, and enhances database management with Text2SQL and BI features.
data.content:
Chat2DB - AI Text2SQL Tool for Easy Database Management
===============

[![Image 1: logo](https://cdn.chat2db-ai.com/img/logo_white.svg)](https://chat2db.ai/)

[Home](https://chat2db.ai/)[Pricing](https://chat2db.ai/pricing)[Download](https://chat2db.ai/download)[Docs](https://chat2db.ai/resources)[Blog](https://chat2db.ai/resources/blog)[Change Log](https://chat2db.ai/resources/changelog)

[Home](https://chat2db.ai/)[Pricing](https://chat2db.ai/pricing)[Download](https://chat2db.ai/download)[Docs](https://chat2db.ai/resources)[Blog](https://chat2db.ai/resources/blog)[Change Log](https://chat2db.ai/resources/changelog)

[Join in Discord](https://discord.gg/cKt72wcfVp)

[19.6K](https://github.com/codePhiliaX/Chat2DB)[Login](https://app.chat2db.ai/settings/purchase)

[![Image 2: reward](https://chat2db.ai/images/reward.png)](https://www.benchcouncil.org/evaluation/opencs/annual.html#Achievements)

AI SQL Generator for Easy Database Management
=============================================

Connect to all your data sources and instantly generate optimized SQL queries with AI to gain fast, actionable insights.

Get Started

19.6KStars on GitHub

![Image 3: Tech illustration](https://chat2db.ai/images/firstscreen/tech.png)

If you don't know SQL well, AI can generate instant data insights without writing SQL.

Technical

Non technical

Cross-platform AI Database Client
---------------------------------

![Image 4](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/code.svg)

### Generate SQL Queries with AI

Generate high-performance SQL for complex queries using natural language, as well as optimize SQL query performanc with AI.

![Image 5](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/save.svg)

### Efficient SQL Coding with AI SQL Editor

![Image 6](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/ai.svg)

### Generate CREATE TABLE SQL with AI

![Image 7](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/import.svg)

### Import/Export Data in Many Formats

![Image 8](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/data_migration.svg)

### Database Migration

Best AI tool for Data Analysis
------------------------------

![Image 11](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/chat.svg)

### Get Lightning Fast Insights from Your Data with AI

Complex reasoning is enabled through intermediate steps, with AI generating insights from SQL queries, charts, and extended questions, helping you easily gain key insights.

![Image 12](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/dashborad.svg)

### Create a Dashboard using AI

![Image 13](https://chat2db.ai/images/icon/excel.svg)

### Analyze Excel Data with AI

Best AI tool for Data Analysis
------------------------------

### Get Lightning Fast Insights from Your Data with AI

### Create a Dashboard using AI

### Analyze Excel Data with AI

AI knows your database
----------------------

Customize business terms in AI column comments within datasets to help AI better understand your database, generate optimized SQL queries, and perform advanced AI data analysis.

![Image 14: know-your-db](https://chat2db.ai/images/know-you-db.webp)

Supported databases
-------------------

Stop jumping between multiple tools! With Chat2DB, you can easily connect and manage any database, all from one intuitive platform. No matter the database type, we provide seamless integration so you can focus on diving deep into your data and driving insights.

[![Image 15: MySQL](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/MySQL.svg)MySQL](https://www.mysql.com/)

[![Image 16: Clickhouse](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Clickhouse.svg)Clickhouse](https://clickhouse.com/)

[![Image 17: MongoDB](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/MongoDB.svg)MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/)

[![Image 18: Snowflake](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Snowflake.svg)Snowflake](https://www.snowflake.com/)

[![Image 19: H2](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/H2.svg)H2](https://www.h2database.com/)

[![Image 20: Oracle](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Oracle.svg)Oracle](https://www.oracle.com/database/)

[![Image 21: PostgreSQL](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/PostgreSQL.svg)PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/)

[![Image 22: DM](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/DM.svg)DM](https://www.dameng.com/)

[![Image 23: Presto](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Presto.svg)Presto](https://prestodb.io/)

[![Image 24: OceanBase](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/OceanBase.svg)OceanBase](https://www.oceanbase.com/)

[![Image 25: HIVE](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/HIVE.svg)HIVE](https://hive.apache.org/)

[![Image 26: Kingbase](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Kingbase.svg)Kingbase](https://www.kingbase.com.cn/)

[![Image 27: Redis](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Redis.svg)Redis](https://redis.io/)

[![Image 28: OpenGauss](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/OpenGauss.svg)OpenGauss](https://opengauss.org/)

[![Image 29: Apache Kylin](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/Apache%20Kylin.svg)Apache Kylin](https://kylin.apache.org/)

[![Image 30: SunDB](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/SunDB.svg)SunDB](http://www.sundb.com/)

[![Image 31: TiDB](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/TiDB.svg)TiDB](https://www.pingcap.com/tidb/)

[![Image 32: CockroachDB](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/cockroachdb.svg)CockroachDB](https://www.cockroachlabs.com/)

[![Image 33: SQLServer](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/SQLServer.svg)SQLServer](https://www.microsoft.com/sql-server/)

[![Image 34: SQLite](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/SQLite.svg)SQLite](https://www.sqlite.org/)

[![Image 35: DB2](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/DB2.svg)DB2](https://www.ibm.com/products/db2)

[![Image 36: MariaDB](https://chat2db.ai/images/database/MariaDB.svg)MariaDB](https://mariadb.org/)

Why Chat2DB?
------------

![Image 37: open_source](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/open_source.svg)

### Open Source

Open-sourced from day one and built in public with a business-friendly Apache 2.0 license, the most popular Text-to-SQL tool on GitHub, used by over a million people.

![Image 38: all_in_one](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/all_in_one.svg)

### All databases in One Place

Supports all popular relational and non-relational databases, whether you're working with local or cloud-based databases, using our desktop client for easy management in one place.

![Image 39: data_security](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/data_security.svg)

### Data Security

Your data will always stay private and data queries are processed locally. We only perceive your schema, never uploading it to the cloud or LLM.

![Image 40: share](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/share.svg)

### Easy Collaboration and Sharing

You can share your dashboards and charts with your team simply through shared links.

![Image 41: integrable](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/integrable.svg)

### Integrable with Your App

Chat2DB provides AI services through APIs. You can integrate it into your application for customers.

![Image 42: stability](https://chat2db.ai/images/why/stability.svg)

### High Stability for Big Data Queries

Maintain high stability and lightning-fast performance for big data queries, preventing crashes and delays.

Protect Your Data at Every Step
-------------------------------

![Image 43: secure-rectangle](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/rectangle.png)

Protect Your Data at Every Step

We have multiple safeguards in place to ensure your data's security at every step.

![Image 44: cloud-download](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/cloud-download.svg)

### Data Security Guarant

Worried about data exposure? Chat2DB keeps your data local and only uses table structure. Plus, our code is open source, ensuring full transparency and security.

![Image 45: lock-closed](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/lock-closed.svg)

### Two-Factor Auth

In Chat2DB, we are serious about security. To ensure account security, we support multiple third-party login platforms, such as Google, and GitHub, for two-factor authentication.

![Image 46: collection](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/collection.svg)

### Data Encryption

Your data is secured with AES and RSA encryption both during storage and transmission, ensuring it's protected from unauthorized access.

![Image 47: shield-check](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/shield-check.svg)

### SSH Tunneling

SSH Tunneling securely connects to your private database, whether it's on-premises, in a data center, or in the cloud. It encrypts all communications to prevent data leakage.

![Image 48: users](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/users.svg)

### Principle of Least Privilege

By following the principle of least privilege, you can ensure that only authorized users access sensitive data and functions, reducing security risks.

![Image 49: archive](https://chat2db.ai/images/secure/archive.svg)

### SQL Audit

Administrators can review all SQL executed within the team, enabling effective SQL auditing to ensure data security and compliance with operational standards.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

If your question is not answered here, you can refer to the product documentation for more frequently asked questions. Weâ€™re always ready to help!

### What is AI SQL and how does it enhance my database management with Chat2DB?

AI SQL in Chat2DB leverages artificial intelligence to generate optimized SQL queries, helping you manage and analyze your database more efficiently. It simplifies complex queries and accelerates data retrieval, making database management more intuitive and effective.

### How does Chat2DB's Text2SQL feature work?

Chat2DB's Text2SQL feature allows you to convert natural language queries into SQL statements automatically. Simply input your questions in plain text, and the AI will generate accurate SQL queries, saving you time and eliminating the need for manual query writing.

### Can Chat2DB assist with AI data analysis for my business?

Yes, Chat2DB's AI-driven platform supports advanced AI data analysis, enabling you to extract valuable insights from your data. With features like AI SQL and automated data visualization, you can make data-driven decisions quickly and efficiently.

### How does Chat2DB integrate AI SQL to improve data querying and analysis?

Chat2DB uses AI SQL to automate query generation, which improves the speed and accuracy of data retrieval. This allows you to focus on data analysis rather than manual SQL coding, making it easier to generate insights from your data.

### Is Text2SQL suitable for non-technical users in Chat2DB?

Absolutely! Chat2DB's Text2SQL feature is designed to make database management accessible to non-technical users. You can simply type your query in plain language, and the AI will generate the corresponding SQL, allowing everyone to leverage the power of SQL without writing code.
